mapper.select: SELECT ch.*, cl.status, cl.time_stamp FROM channels ch, ( SELECT cl1.channel_id, status, time_stamp FROM channel_log cl1, (SELECT channel_id, MAX(time_stamp) mt FROM channel_log) cl2 WHERE cl1.channel_id = cl2.channel_id AND time_stamp = cl2.mt ) cl WHERE ch.channel_id = cl.channel_id AND ch.guild_id = #{guild_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO channels (channel_id, guild_id, channel_name) VALUES (#{channel_id}, #{guild_id}, #{channel_name})
mapper.select: SELECT guild_id, channel_id, channel_name FROM channels WHERE channel_id = #{channel_id}
